creator: venuindus@yahoo.com
text:
Server hit is not logged in the server application log on running the thread 
using Jmeter.

Steps
1) Record a scenario using Jmeter
2) Check the application server log for updates
3) The application log is updated 
4) Run the scenario giving n no: of threads and check the logs
5) The results are given in Jmeter, but the application log is not updated

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The webserver application log is nothing to do with JMeter - check the 
webserver documentation and make sure it is configured correctly.
